response.overview: A novice con man teams up with an acknowledged master to avenge the murder of a mutual friend by pulling off the ultimate big con and swindling a fortune from a big-time mobster.
response.tagline: ...all it takes is a little confidence.
response.title: The Sting

release_dates.note: ABC Network, USA commercial television debut

results.name: Paul Newman Cons a Con Man in a High-Stakes Poker Game in 4K HDR
